name: seminal
content:
seminal adjective
(IMPORTANT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal containing important new ideas and having a great influence on later work: She wrote a seminal article on the subject while she was still a student. He played a seminal role in the formation of the association.

containing important new ideas that influence later developments: "The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn" is regarded as a seminal work of American literature.
